text.more:
The nodes show people, more specific the correspondents of Guido Gezelle.
The edges show who has corresponded with each other, and who is family of each other.
text.intro:
This is a visualisation of the network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata.
The graph shows people who have corresponded with Guido Gezelle and with who Guido Gezelle has corresponded. 
It also shows who of the correspondents is family of each other.
text.title: Family and correspondents in the network of the correspondents of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata
